QuestData.Title: A Nose for This Sort of Thing
QuestData.Description: <The skull speaks to you.>$b$bI live? No, I do not... but I can.$b$bThat raptor you have is wise to have found my skull among what must have been so many. In life, I was strong, powerful, a lord among trolls. With your help, I can be a lord once more.$b$bThe Bloodscalps at Zuuldaia hoard magical fetishes that can help me return. They hide these artifacts under the sand. Use your hatchling to find these artifacts, $n... then throw them in the pot.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use your Lashtail Hatchling to sniff out 8 Zuuldaian Fetishes.
QuestData.CompletionText: <The large troll skull bubbles to the surface.>$b$bHow many did you find?
QuestData.RewardText: <You drop the fetishes into the pot.>$b$bYes... yesss...$b$bMy spirit is strong again, $r, and I am ready to return to the world. Now I need a body.
